actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain mineral interests of the United States to the owner or owners of record of certain lands in the State of Virginia.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain mineral interests of the United States to the owner or owners of record of certain lands in the State of Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain mineral interests of the United States to the owner or owners of record of certain lands in the State of Virginia.
